content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This puzzle fits Clash Of Code well in my opinion

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I like it. Touches on some good programming basics.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: it's easy and good puzzle, nice for clash of code... (easier in python using the eval function)
What will happen when we have to calculate a division and b=0?

Goal
* Please format "+", "-", "*" and "/" as {{constants}} and remove the quotation marks.

Input
* Please change "sign" to "operator".

Cases
* Test 2 and Validator 2: Would you please consider revising both cases such that the output is always an integer? Different programming languages may not always output the same number of decimal places as Python (0.16666666666666666), so, it's not reasonable to require a player to output the exact answer as yours in such as case.

After you've revised the cases as mentioned above, please also add a constraint to mention:

Any division will result in an integer only.

Thanks.

Thanks again for your help!
I will try to solve the above problems ASAP.

Hi Manuel, 
Thanks for your reply!
However, the test cases does not contain any divisions by zero, therefore no worries for that problem!
Best Regards, 
Student

By the way, I will add a nice little tip that says 'No divisions by zero appears'.
Thanks for your reply!
